content: fun silly wig crochet pattern by sara sach please ad this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites ***free pattern on the blog at this link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2021/10/silly-fun-wigs-crochet-pattern-posh html ***video link *** https //youtu be/rqrborex0vm we just retested and updated this crochet pattern with a bunch of new pictures and a brand new video skill easy materials hook - i / 5 50 mm yarn needle yarn -med 4 3 5 oz i used red heart super yarn stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet back loop only blo size for child 19 - 20 inches and adult 22 -24 inches please do not copy or distribute this pattern
